posts.post_content:
Falos: [Iona's Judgment](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Iona's Judgment) is overcosted. [Unmake](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Unmake) or [Path to Exile](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Path to Exile) are better comparisons, and while they're narrower, they're much more comparable in price. Comparatively, C. Purge isn't tearing up Standard.  
  
Certainly not bad in the sideboard, though. About as useful as the other hosers, although [Autumn's Veil](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Autumn's Veil) is probably the lame duck of the group.  
  
Cheza: I'd expect *something* that'll stop walkers in Scars.
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
[Autumn's Veil](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Autumn's Veil) (green) - A defensive counterspell ([Hindering Light](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hindering Light)) when [Vines of Vastwood](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vines of Vastwood) is almost as good.  
[Combust](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Combust) (red) - [Deathmark](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Deathmark) always works for 1‚ this USUALLY works for 2.  
[Deathmark](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Deathmark) (black) - A one mana mono-[Terminate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Terminate).  
[Flashfreeze](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Flashfreeze) (blue) - Hard [Cancel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cancel) for U less.  
[Celestial Purge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Celestial Purge) (white) - Strictly better than [Iona's Judgement](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Iona's Judgement).  
  
D.Counter = 1 or 2  
Soft Removal = 2  
Removal = 3  
Counter = 2 or 3  
Exile = 5 or 6  
  
The message is clear: "BUY MORE WALLETSLAYER DVDS"
